I have been working with Web technologies since 1992. I have co-founded two browser companies, Opera Software and Vivaldi Technologies. I was CEO at Opera and I am CEO at Vivaldi.

I am a strong proponent of open standards. I believe in building feature rich products that can be adapted to the needs of users without collecting information about usage. I believe no company has the right to profile their users.

We are a climbing gym in #LosAngeles #California. We offer #Bouldering #TopRoping and #LeadClimbing terrain and classes, plus #Yoga and #Fitness classes. Our facilities include 40+' climbing walls, a fitness area, saunas, autobelays, and more. We welcome new day users and members. Our building is a Los Angeles Cultural-Historic Monument, the former California Edison Steam Power Plant #3. We are within the Brewery Arts Complex that hosts the biannual #BreweryArtwalk.

Climb with us!
